sentence.Network_en: Mace still remembers the pitiful wailing of the trapped and the wounded.
sentence.Network_cn: 梅斯依然还记得那些被困者和受伤者的令人同情的哀号.

sentence.Network_en: She heard him let out a pitiful, muffled groan.
sentence.Network_cn: 她听到他发出一声令人悲悯的低沉的呻吟声。

sentence.Network_en: He sounded both pitiful and eager to get what he wanted.
sentence.Network_cn: 他听起来既可怜兮兮的，又对想要的东西充满渴望。

entry.tran: 令人怜悯的；使人同情的；可怜的
entry.def: Someone or something that is pitiful is so sad, weak, or small that you feel pity for them.

example.ex: He sounded both pitiful and eager to get what he wanted...
example.tran: 他听起来既可怜兮兮的，又对想要的东西充满渴望。

example.ex: It was the most pitiful sight I had ever seen.
example.tran: 这是我看到过的最令人同情的一幕。

entry.def: If you describe something as pitiful, you mean that it is completely inadequate.

example.ex: The choice is pitiful and the quality of some of the products is very low...
example.tran: 选择余地极小，而且其中一些产品的质量很差。

example.ex: The farmers pay pitiful wages, often in the form of food and clothes.
example.tran: 农场主支付的报酬少得可怜，还经常是以食物和衣服的形式。

entry.def: If you describe something as pitiful, you mean that it does not deserve respect or consideration.

example.ex: This argument seems to show a pitiful lack of confidence in the capabilities of our juries.
example.tran: 这一论点似乎表现出对我们陪审团能力的极度不信任，而这种不信任是可悲的。

sentences.sentence: "my finances were in a deplorable state"
"the shabby room struck her as extraordinarily pathetic"- Galsworthy

auth_sentence.content: What a pitiful and disgusting world we live in.
auth_sentence.res_content: What a pitiful and disgusting world we live in.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What a pitiful and disgusting world we live in.

auth_sentence.content: May the Goddess have mercy on your pitiful spirits.
auth_sentence.res_content: May the Goddess have mercy on your pitiful spirits.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: May the Goddess have mercy on your pitiful spirits.

auth_sentence.content: Meals are a pitiful drop in the benefit bucket.
auth_sentence.res_content: Meals are a pitiful drop in the benefit bucket.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Meals are a pitiful drop in the benefit bucket.

sentences.en: But what has brought the company to such a pitiful condition since I last worked for it?
sentences.cn: 自我最后一次为该公司工作以来,什么原因使得公司落到这般可怜的境地?

sentences.en: It is pitiful to see that the life of an animal in a zoo is spent in an locked iron cage.
sentences.cn: 看到动物园里的动物一生都被关在铁笼子里,真是令人可怜。

sentences.en: a pitiful attempt to stop the ball
